Package controller

Class ControlPlayer

java.lang.Object
java.rmi.server.RemoteObject
java.rmi.server.RemoteServer
java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
controller.ControlPlayer
All Implemented Interfaces:
ControllerAskNotify, GameHandler, Serializable, Remote
Direct Known Subclasses:
RMIControlPlayer, SocketControlPlayer
public abstract class ControlPlayer extends UnicastRemoteObject implements GameHandler, ControllerAskNotify, Serializable
Superclass of SockerControlPlayer and RMIControlPlayer

      /**
      Parameters:
      stream_tiles - ordered list of tiles to insert
      column - column where to insert the tiles
      Returns:
      always true when
      Throws:
      NotMyTurnException - : the player status is NOT_MY_TURN

    • catchTile

      public List<Tile> catchTile(List<Integer> coord) throws InvalidParametersException, InvalidChoiceException, NotMyTurnException, NotConnectedException
      if everything it's ok, remove the selected tiles from the board
      Parameters:
      coord - list
      Returns:
      List of catch tiles
      Throws:
      InvalidParametersException - the list of coordinates is not compliant
      InvalidChoiceException - the tiles selected are not catchable, the player have no enough space in his bookshelf or tiles are not in line
      NotMyTurnException - the player status is NOT_MY_TURN (the move is not allowed)
      NotConnectedException - the player is not connected
